source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: How to Improve Your Creature Design Drawings - Step by Step
items.headline: Learn to Draw Amazing Creature Concepts with Confidence!
objectives_summary: You will learn how to draw a variety of creature concepts.
Proficiently draw from your imagination.
The techniques to developing a creature transformation.

items.title: Learn the Secret of Successful Color Mixing for Painters
items.headline: How to get the color you want every time you paint
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, you will be able to confidently mix any color you need.
Learn how color works.
Learn how to create bright and muted versions of any color.

items.title: How To Use Photoshop To Make Digital Design Paper Fast, Easy

visible_instructors.title: Cat Whipple
visible_instructors.job_title: Photoshop expert teaching Photoshop to artists: 4 courses
visible_instructors.name: Cat

items.headline: Learn how to create digital design paper using Adobe Photoshop, for creative projects or art backgrounds
objectives_summary: Understand what digital design paper is
Know where to find public domain images for use in creating design paper
Create custom Photoshop brushes

items.title: Procreate - Learn 15 Easy Painting Techniques
items.headline: Master a variety of styles and techniques with this step-by-step Procreate course
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of digital painting in Procreate
Master 15 painting techniques

items.title: The Power of Gesture Drawing: how to gesture draw figures
items.headline: Take your figure from okay to stunning with gesture drawing
objectives_summary: Draw great action poses using gesture drawings
Learning what gesture drawing is and is not
Use gesture drawing to draw figures quickly

items.title: Origami Paper crafts - Elementary Course
items.headline: Basic course for origami paper folding. Learn the most efficient and neat way for origami folding.
objectives_summary: ・ fold basic and some high level Origami crafts without seeing video.
・teach kids, group of people who wants to learn craft, or senior people at nursery home.
・get jobs at school, kindergarten, nursery school, or nursery home,

items.title: Fundamentals of Coloured Pencils - Beginners Course
items.headline: From beginner to photo-realistic artist in one course. All the 'MUST KNOW' techniques of drawing in coloured pencils.
objectives_summary: Confidently understand every use of the oil and waxed based pencils.
Understand colour theory, how to mix colours, how to find colours and how to accurately match colours.
The process of layering to create realistic dimension and form.

items.title: Beginner Resin Art - Acrylic, Ink & Mixed Media Zen Painting
items.headline: Creating A Zen Art piece on an aluminum disk with Resin, Acrylics and other mixed media - Beginner step by step.
objectives_summary: Create A Beautiful and unique Art Disk using, Resin, Alcohol Ink, and other mixed media of their choice.
A desire to learn and a little bit of time to practice these techniques
Mix Resin with confidence

items.title: Cake Decorating For Fun and Profit
items.headline: Cake Decorating Course from a National Award Winning baker with over 30 years of cake decorating experience!
objectives_summary: The purpose of this fun course is to introduce you to the equipment, recipes, and basic techniques used in cake decorating.

items.title: Procreate : Learn to Draw and Paint on the iPad
items.headline: Learn how to use this amazing app and an iPad to create professional looking artwork.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to effectively navigate and understand the tools within Procreate.
You will be able to draw and paint a character concept with more confidence.
You will learn how to create and share your own custom brushes

items.title: Watercolor Landscape Painting for Beginners
items.headline: Draw & Paint Three Beautiful Landscapes in Watercolor
objectives_summary: Paint beautiful and colorful landscapes based on live reference or photo reference
Create an interpretation of the landscape you see and express it in watercolors

items.title: Drawing course for TOTAL BEGINNERS - From Line to STILL LIFE
items.headline: Master Pencil Drawing Fundamentals, Develop Your Drawing Skills, Take Your Hobby to the Next Level, Learn Easy Shading
objectives_summary: To draw continuous and straight lines
To draw proper shapes
To find geometric shapes in any complex form

items.title: Paint Landscapes in Watercolor Part 2
items.headline: This is the second part of my Watercolor Landscapes Course.
objectives_summary: At the end of the course you will be able to paint water, buildings and people.
You will be able to simplify any landscape and paint these elements simply and  quickly.

items.title: How to Draw and Color Backgrounds plus Composition
items.headline: Draw and color amazing backgrounds for your comics, concept art, and more. Plus learn composition
objectives_summary: Draw backgrounds that have correct perspective and light and shadow.
Paint backgrounds with proper colors and tone.
Draw awesome backgrounds for their comics

items.title: Easy to learn basic Balloon Decorating for parties & events

visible_instructors.title: Peter J. Smith
visible_instructors.name: Peter J.
visible_instructors.job_title: Clinical Hypnotherapist , Balloon expert and businessman

items.headline: Step by step instructions on how to build and create fabulous decor using balloons. Impress your friends with new skills
objectives_summary: work confidently with balloons and create a variety of professional style balloon decorations. You will gain a good background knowledge of working with balloons that will ensure that your balloon decorations are successful. You will understand the differences between air filling and helium filling balloons and their uses.

items.title: Acrylic Abstract Painting Atmospheric Landscapes
items.headline: Learn How You Can Create Stunning Abstract Paintings in the Atmospheric Landscape Style
objectives_summary: After Completing this Course Students will have confidence in creating acrylic abstract paintings in the atmospheric landscape style.
